overview: Few spaceship pilots are as galactically infamous as the legendary Captain D! When he receives word of a long lost treasure, the explorer sets out on the hunt! But hot on his trail is the mysterious Trixana, who has her eyes on the prize, and a hidden link to Captain D's naughty past. Who will get to the treasure first, the dashing Captain D, or his former fling? Blast off into DP World's Digital Galaxy: Deeper Space to find out!
title: Deeper Space
